summary: Two agents - a lady-killer human and a voluptuous demon - attempt to protect a signatory to a peace ceremony between the human world and the "Black World" from radicalized demons.
cast: Yûsaku Yara|Toshiko Fujita|Ichirô Nagai|Takeshi Aono|Mari Yokô|Tamio Ôki|Kôji Totani|Yasuo Muramatsu|Kazuhiko Kishino|Arisa Andô|Asami Mukaidono|Ikuya Sawaki|Masato Hirano|Gregory Snegoff|Mike Reynolds|Gaye Kruger|Edie Mirman|Jeff Winkless|David Povall|Alexandra Kenworthy|Eleni Kelakos|Robert V. Barron|Steve Kramer|Jason Klassi|Melora Harte|Frank Catalano|Stuart Milligan|Tamsin Hollo|George Little|William Roberts|Ray Lonnen|Liza Ross|Graydon Gould|Douglas Blackwell|John Dantona|Adam Henderson|Joyce Kurtz|Carl Macek|Kerrigan Mahan|Edward Mannix|Michael McConnohie|Pamela Merrick|Brian Note|Bob Sessions
title: Monster city
